title: [Large-Scale] Order Picking Worker Learning and Productivity Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical calculation skills and experience with simple administrative tasks
context.additional_context: Targeting novice workers performing order processing tasks in a logistics warehouse environment. Conducting practical training and assessments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce order-picking time to within 80% of the baseline within two weeks.
Learners can reduce errors to below 2% per picking operation.
Learners can improve initial task productivity by at least 15% under monetary incentive conditions.
Learners can improve task efficiency by 10% using a promotion-oriented regulatory focus.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
